an2.98-117:98.1.3: Yo ca anāgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati, yo ca āgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati.
an2.98-117:99.1.3: Yo ca anāgataṃ bhāraṃ na vahati, yo ca āgataṃ bhāraṃ vahati.
an2.98-117:100.1.3: Yo ca akappiye kappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye akappiyasaññī.
an2.98-117:101.1.3: Yo ca akappiye akappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye kappiyasaññī.
an2.98-117:102.1.3: Yo ca anāpattiyā āpattisaññī, yo ca āpattiyā anāpattisaññī.
an2.98-117:103.1.3: Yo ca anāpattiyā anāpattisaññī, yo ca āpattiyā āpattisaññī.
an2.98-117:104.1.3: Yo ca adhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca dhamme adhammasaññī.
an2.98-117:105.1.3: Yo ca dhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca adhamme adhammasaññī.
an2.98-117:106.1.3: Yo ca avinaye vinayasaññī, yo ca vinaye avinayasaññī.
an2.98-117:107.1.3: Yo ca avinaye avinayasaññī, yo ca vinaye vinayasaññī.
an2.98-117:108.1.3: Yo ca na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyati, yo ca kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyati.
an2.98-117:108.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:109.1.3: Yo ca na kukkuccāyitabbaṃ na kukkuccāyati, yo ca kukkuccāyitabbaṃ kukkuccāyati.
an2.98-117:109.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:110.1.3: Yo ca akappiye kappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye akappiyasaññī.
an2.98-117:110.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:111.1.3: Yo ca akappiye akappiyasaññī, yo ca kappiye kappiyasaññī.
an2.98-117:111.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:112.1.3: Yo ca āpattiyā anāpattisaññī, yo ca anāpattiyā āpattisaññī.
an2.98-117:112.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:113.1.3: Yo ca āpattiyā āpattisaññī, yo ca anāpattiyā anāpattisaññī.
an2.98-117:113.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:114.1.3: Yo ca adhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca dhamme adhammasaññī.
an2.98-117:114.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:115.1.3: Yo ca dhamme dhammasaññī, yo ca adhamme adhammasaññī.
an2.98-117:115.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:116.1.3: Yo ca avinaye vinayasaññī, yo ca vinaye avinayasaññī.
an2.98-117:116.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā vaḍḍhantī”ti.
an2.98-117:117.1.3: Yo ca avinaye avinayasaññī, yo ca vinaye vinayasaññī.
an2.98-117:117.1.4: Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, dvinnaṃ āsavā na vaḍḍhantī”ti.
